subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: The Atlanta Motor Speedway has played host to at least two top Nascar races per year since 1960, but the change was made to deal with sagging attendance.
snippet: The Atlanta Motor Speedway has played host to at least two top Nascar races per year since 1960, but the change was made to deal with sagging attendance.
